title: Andrew Adonis – 2021 Comments on Dominic Cummings and Vote Leave
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Andrew Adonis on Twitter on 20 June 2021.
content: I’ve made a submission to the House of Commons committee on enforcing attendance of witnesses pointing out that Cummings still hasn’t given evidence on Vote Leave’s illegal activities. They gave him a platform to denounce Hancock on Covid, how about the truth on Brexit?
